review: The Roku Stick 3500 refurbished works like a charm.  Very easy to hookup, used my iPhone to activate it online.  I power it with Ian connection to HDTV.  It shuts on and off with the TV.  I get all the movies I want to watch on Netflix.  I cut back on my cable services, just to local news channels which I could get OTA if I wanted to.  I got the refurbished Roku Stick for $35 and now save $80 that I spent for TV channels I never used.  Roku Stick is great I have had it over a month now.  I set it up the once and it has been working ever since.  I read reviews that say it is slow loading for Netflix, no complaint here, I watch a lot of movies on Netflix with it.  It is a great buy.
author: Mary Lou

review: I could not get it set up, and the Roku people were not helpful.  I returned it and instead bought an Amazon Firestick, and it works great.
author: M E Palmer

review: I have had this product for about two weeks now it connected to my network once initially so I set up Pandora listened to a couple songs the I attempt to connect my Netflix, since then I have been having a connectivity issue during the various network checks the network seems fine and all my other devices work fine on the same network, I get all check marks when I update the system but cannot utilize this product for what I bought if for which was and extra streaming device for my bedroom, I am considering returning this device besides it is extremely slow throughout the loading of each channel
author: Damian K Tull

review: A bit sluggish, and the interface could do with improvement. But overall it does what it is intended for.
